demo.des: Summary29 is a proof of concept developed by Foundation 29 of the capabilities of generative AI in a healthcare context. It allows experimentation with real examples of how AI can be used to summarise medical content.
demo.What do you want to do?: What do you want to do?
demo.How do you want to start?: Try Nav29 with a medical report that you don't understand, we want to surprise you.
demo.startsubtitle: It can be any type of report. You can take a photo in good light and making sure the text is legible, Nav29 will read it for you. You can also use a file, a PDF or a Word document are preferred.
demo.Drag and drop file here: Drag and drop your reports here
demo.descripReports: We understand that these data are very sensitive. All the data will be deleted when you close this window.
demo.Tokens limit exceeded: Token limit exceeded, delete a document to continue.
demo.No documents to summarize: There are no documents to summarize, or you have not finished extracting the text.
demo.Add new document: How do you want to add documents?
demo.allowcamera: You must allow the camera to continue. Please enable camera access in your browser settings and try again.
demo.demot: Do you have medical reports that you don't understand?
demo.demot2: Press the button to start understanding your medical data
demo.Extracting the text from the documents: Nav29 is analyzing the document and extracting the text.
demo.The summary is being generated: Nav29 is generating the summary. The process may take up to a minute.
demo.This may take up to a minute: Be patient, it may take up to a minute.
demo.A problem occurred while extracting text: A problem occurred while extracting text
demo.While you wait: While you wait, see everything you can get if you register as a user. There is no cost to register, it only has advantages.

Advantages.title: Start taking control over your medical data!
Advantages.d1: Store and access your medical reports from a single place, always protected. Your data belongs to you and is backed by Fundaci√≥n 29.
Advantages.d2: Turn complex medical reports into easy-to-understand summaries. Make informed decisions about your health.
Advantages.d3: Ask questions and get clear answers from your medical reports through a simple conversational interface.
Advantages.d4: Search for medications, clinical trials, and medical advancements. Your personal medical assistant is always at your service.
Advantages.d5: Share your medical reports securely with your healthcare team. You always retain control of your data.
Advantages.d6: Record and organize your medical appointments and important events. Always carry your digital brain with you.

feedback.title: Your opinion is very important to us. Please review the patient summary and the summaries of each uploaded file, and help us improve by providing your feedback. After reviewing the summary, you will find a form at the bottom to share your comments and suggestions.
feedback.title2: When you delete a file, or upload a new file and it finishes processing, you will be able to regenerate the patient summary.
feedback.Give us your opinion on the summary: Give us your opinion on the summary
feedback.t1: Your opinion is important to us
feedback.subt1: Your feedback is essential to improve this tool.
feedback.q1: Indicate the quality of the summary
feedback.onstarts: Please, rate the quality by clicking on the stars.
feedback.mandatory: To close this window, it is mandatory to evaluate the summary.

voice.Sorry, voice recognition is not supporte: Sorry, voice recognition is not supported in your browser.
voice.We recommend that you use Google Chrome,: We recommend that you use Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, or Safari.
voice.Do you want to continue recording?: Do you want to continue recording?
No, I want to start a new recording.

reg.p2: We have sent a confirmation email to
reg.p3: Please check your email and click on the link to verfiy your email address.
reg.p7: Please enter your email address to request a password reset.
reg.p8: Please check your email and click on the link to verify your email address.

promts.0:
Behave like an expert in detecting sentence intentions. A patient writes the following sentence: '{{value}}'. 
Choose only one of the following intentions the patient wants to make: 
1.$Data (When providing information about the patient) 
2.$Question (When asks something or send something with the question mark) 
3.$Share (He must to tell you the word 'share') 
4.$Take Quiz (When he want to make a questionnaire) 
If it is none of this 4 intentions, returns: 
2.$Question
promts.1: Behave like a doctor. You have to give specific information and not general. Use only sources of medical information.

timeline.title: Timeline summary
timeline.description: View a summary of your medical history in chronological order, from your initial diagnosis to the most recent treatments. Ideal for getting an overview of your clinical evolution.

detailed.title: Detailed summary
detailed.description: Get a complete report with all relevant details of your medical history, including diagnoses, tests, treatments, and observations. Perfect for an in-depth analysis of your health.

nextConsultation.title: Summary for next consultation
nextConsultation.description: Prepare a concise summary of your current health status, recent treatments, and questions for your doctor. Perfect for your next consultation to ensure you don't forget any important details.

symptomsTracking.title: Symptoms and tracking summary
symptomsTracking.description: Generate a report that includes a description of the symptoms you have experienced, how they have evolved, and any changes in your treatment or well-being. Useful for monitoring your daily health.

familyCaregivers.title: Summary for family or caregivers
familyCaregivers.description: Create an accessible and easy-to-understand report to share with family members or caregivers, summarizing your medical situation in a simple and clear manner.

secondOpinion.title: Summary for second medical opinion
secondOpinion.description: Prepare a detailed summary of your medical history, including diagnoses and treatments, ideal for consulting with a second specialist.

recentTestsResults.title: Summary of recent tests and results
recentTestsResults.description: Get a summary of the most recent tests and their results, along with their interpretation. Perfect for staying on top of your latest studies.

medicationsTreatments.title: Summary of medications and treatments
medicationsTreatments.description: Generate a summary of the medications you are taking and the treatments you are following. Useful for reviewing your medication or discussing possible adjustments with your doctor.

insuranceFormalities.title: Summary for insurance or medical formalities
insuranceFormalities.description: Get a formal summary of your medical history, with the necessary data for insurance procedures or health administrative tasks.

dxgpt.description: Automatically analyzes the clinical information you enter, including reports, notes and recorded events, and generates a structured list of possible diagnoses based on extracted symptom patterns.
dxgpt.detailedInformation: ‚ùì What is the detailed information about the disease?
dxgpt.differentialSymptoms: ‚ùì What are the differential symptoms in this case?
dxgpt.symptomMatches: ‚ùì What matches are there between the patient's symptoms and the disease?

treatAndDrugs.q1: How should I take this medication?
treatAndDrugs.q2: What side effects might this medication have?
treatAndDrugs.q3: Can I combine this medication with others I am taking?
treatAndDrugs.q4: What should I do if I miss a dose?
treatAndDrugs.q5: How can I tell if my medication is working?

symtomsauto.q1: What can I do to alleviate this symptom?
symtomsauto.q2: Is it normal to feel this after my treatment?
symtomsauto.q3: When should I be concerned about a symptom?
symtomsauto.q4: Are there self-care techniques that can help with my condition?
symtomsauto.q5: How can I monitor my condition at home?

eduandResources.q1: Where can I find more information about my illness?
eduandResources.q2: Are there support groups for people with my condition?
eduandResources.q3: How can I stay updated on available treatments?
eduandResources.q4: What educational resources are recommended for my condition?
eduandResources.q5: Are there apps or online tools that can help me?

bienestar.q1: How can I manage the stress related to my illness?
bienestar.q2: Are there specific relaxation techniques I should try?
bienestar.q3: How can I improve my emotional well-being?
bienestar.q4: When should I seek psychological support?
bienestar.q5: What strategies can I use to manage anxiety?

nutriestilo.q1: What dietary changes could benefit my condition?
nutriestilo.q2: How can my lifestyle affect my health?
nutriestilo.q3: Are there foods I should avoid due to my condition?
nutriestilo.q4: Can you recommend healthy and easy recipes?
nutriestilo.q5: What supplements or vitamins are recommended for me?

comunicacion.q1: What questions should I ask my doctor at my next appointment?
comunicacion.q2: How can I effectively communicate my symptoms to the doctor?
comunicacion.q3: What should I do to prepare for a surgery or procedure?
comunicacion.q4: How can I keep a record of my health to share it?
comunicacion.q5: How can I get a second medical opinion?

actividades.q1: What type of exercise is safe for me?
actividades.q2: How can I stay active with physical limitations?
actividades.q3: Are there physical activities I should avoid?
actividades.q4: What exercises can help improve my condition?
actividades.q5: How can I incorporate exercise into my daily routine?

list.cat1: Management of Patient Health and Medication

treatAndDrugs.q1: How can I organize the patient's medication schedule?
treatAndDrugs.q2: What should I do if the patient shows adverse reactions to a medication?
treatAndDrugs.q3: How to keep an accurate record of the patient's medications and treatments?
treatAndDrugs.q4: What should I do if the patient refuses to take their medication?
treatAndDrugs.q5: How to identify signs of improvement or deterioration in the patient's condition?
treatAndDrugs.q6: What are the patient's daily personal care needs?
treatAndDrugs.q7: How can I effectively track the patient's symptoms?
treatAndDrugs.q8: What equipment or supplies do I need for daily care?
treatAndDrugs.q9: How can I manage the patient's mobility or physical limitations?

nutridiet.q1: What is the recommended diet for the patient?
nutridiet.q2: How can I prepare meals that meet the patient's dietary restrictions?
nutridiet.q3: What foods should be avoided given the patient's condition?
nutridiet.q4: How can I ensure that the patient is receiving enough nutrients?
nutridiet.q5: What healthy and condition-specific recipes can you suggest?

emeaid.q1: What should I do in case of a health crisis?
emeaid.q2: How can I identify the signs of a medical emergency?
emeaid.q3: What basic first aid procedures should I know?
emeaid.q4: How can I stay calm and efficient in an emergency situation?
emeaid.q5: When and how should I contact emergency services?

suppment.q1: How can I emotionally support the patient?
suppment.q2: What strategies can I use to manage my own stress?
suppment.q3: How can I maintain effective and empathetic communication with the patient and other family members?
suppment.q4: What resources are available for emotional support of the caregiver?
suppment.q5: How can I detect signs of burnout in myself?

commuhealth.q1: Which specialists should I consult if there is still no clear diagnosis of the patient's illness?
commuhealth.q2: What medical studies do you suggest to advance the diagnosis process?
commuhealth.q3: What information is crucial to share with the patient's doctor?
commuhealth.q4: How can I prepare for the patient's medical appointments?
commuhealth.q5: What questions should I ask the doctor to better understand the patient's illness?
commuhealth.q6: What questions should I ask the doctor to better understand the treatment?
commuhealth.q7: How can I effectively advocate for the patient's needs?
commuhealth.q8: How can I keep an accurate record of the patient's health to share with professionals?

comunicacion.q1: Where can I find reliable information about the patient's condition?
comunicacion.q2: What educational or healthcare resources are available for the patient's condition?
comunicacion.q3: What are the different schooling options for the patient appropriate to her condition?
comunicacion.q4: Where can I go to be informed about the different educational centers suitable for the patient?
comunicacion.q5: What resources, financial aid or subsidies are available for patients with special needs?
comunicacion.q6: What courses or workshops are available for caregivers?
comunicacion.q7: How can I learn care techniques specific to the patient's condition?
comunicacion.q8: Are there community resources or assistance programs for caregivers?
comunicacion.q9: How can I stay up to date on advances in the treatment or management of the disease?
comunicacion.q10: What associations, foundations or parent groups are there about the patient's illness?

actividades.q1: What recreational activities are safe and beneficial for the patient?
actividades.q2: What activities can serve to stimulate the patient from a cognitive/intellectual point of view?
actividades.q3: How can I help the patient stay physically active?
actividades.q4: Are there specific exercises recommended for his condition?
actividades.q5: How can I integrate exercise into the patient's daily routine?
actividades.q6: What precautions should I take when doing physical activities with the patient?
actividades.q7: What precautions should I take to avoid an overload of activities that could be harmful to the patient?

monifollow.q1: Can you show a timeline to see the patient's evolution over time?
monifollow.q2: I want to see the progress and evolution since the start of treatment
monifollow.q3: Help me identify patterns or trends in my health over time
monifollow.q4: Identify correlations between my daily activities and changes in my health
monifollow.q5: Analyze my medical test results over time to detect significant changes

list.cat4: Management of Complex and Multidisciplinary Cases

diageval.q1: Please provide me with the patient's latest laboratory results and their medical interpretation.
diageval.q2: What indicators should I look for in a diagnostic image for this condition?
diageval.q3: What are the key symptoms that differentiate this disease from similar ones?
diageval.q4: How to assess the severity of the patient's condition?
diageval.q5: What additional tests might be necessary to confirm the diagnosis?
diageval.q6: How is the evolution of my condition?

plantreat.q1: What are the most effective treatment options for this condition?
plantreat.q2: How can I personalize the treatment plan for this particular patient?
plantreat.q3: What considerations should I keep in mind when prescribing medications medicines for this patient?
plantreat.q4: How can I monitor and adjust the treatment over time?
plantreat.q5: What preventive strategies can I recommend to avoid complications?

educomu.q1: How can I clearly explain the diagnosis and treatment to the patient?
educomu.q2: What educational resources can I provide to the patient for their condition?
educomu.q3: How can I foster effective communication with reluctant or anxious patients?
educomu.q4: How to manage the patient's expectations about their illness and treatment?
educomu.q5: What techniques can I use to improve patient adherence to treatment?

complexcases.q1: When should I consider referral to a specialist?
complexcases.q2: How can I coordinate care with other health professionals?
complexcases.q3: What strategies can I use to manage complex medical cases?
complexcases.q4: How can I effectively address the psychosocial aspects of patient care?
complexcases.q5: What ethical considerations should I keep in mind in complicated cases?

investmeds.q1: Where can I find the latest research on this disease?
investmeds.q2: How can I incorporate new discoveries and treatments into my clinical practice?
investmeds.q3: How can I stay up to date on the progress of the patient's disease?
investmeds.q4: What medical journals or conferences are recommended to learn more about this patient's illness?

monifollow.q1: Can you show a timeline to see the patient's evolution over time?
monifollow.q2: I want to see the progress and evolution since the start of treatment
monifollow.q3: Help me identify patterns or trends in my health over time
monifollow.q4: Identify correlations between changes in the patient's daily activities and changes in their clinical condition.
monifollow.q5: Analyze my medical test results over time to detect significant changes

carepat.q1: How can I identify and prioritize the care needs of my patients?
carepat.q2: What care techniques are most effective for the patient's condition?
carepat.q3: How can I prevent infections in this patient?
carepat.q4: What strategies can I use to manage pain and discomfort for the patient?
carepat.q5: How can I effectively assess the patient's response to treatment?

comuedu.q1: How can I educate patients about their health and treatment?
comuedu.q2: What educational resources can I use to support patients and their families?
comuedu.q3: How can I improve my communication skills with patients from diverse cultures and backgrounds?
comuedu.q4: What techniques can I use to compassionately communicate bad news?
comuedu.q5: How can I encourage active patient participation in their care?

coordination.q1: How can I work effectively in a multidisciplinary care team?
coordination.q2: Review the history and look for a specialist to whom this patient could be referred that has not been done.
coordination.q3: How can I contribute to the planning and review of patient care plans?
coordination.q4: Are there any specific protocols that may be necessary for this patient?
coordination.q5: Make a patient summary with all the information necessary to transfer the patient to another doctor.

emergencies.q1: Generate a checklist that enables the patient or their caregivers to act effectively in emergency situations.
emergencies.q2: What protocols should I follow for resuscitation and vital support?
emergencies.q3: How can I maintain calm and clarity in high-pressure situations?
emergencies.q4: What first aid skills are crucial to care for this patient?
emergencies.q5: How can I ensure the safety of the patient and the team during an emergency?

development.q1: What opportunities are there for professional development in my field?
development.q2: How can I stay updated on best practices and advances in nursing?
development.q3: What additional courses or certifications could benefit my career?
development.q4: How can I participate in research and contribute to nursing knowledge?
development.q5: What strategies can I use to balance my work and continuing education?

wellbeing.q1: How can I manage stress and avoid burnout at work?
wellbeing.q2: What self-care techniques are effective for nurses?
wellbeing.q3: How can I maintain a healthy balance between work and personal life?
wellbeing.q4: What resources are available to support the mental and emotional health of nurses?
wellbeing.q5: How can I build a support network among colleagues?

researchdesign.q1: How can I design a clinical study to test this hypothesis?
researchdesign.q2: What statistical methods are most suitable for analyzing these data?
researchdesign.q3: How can I ensure that my study complies with ethical standards?
researchdesign.q4: What considerations should I have when selecting a population sample?
researchdesign.q5: How can I mitigate potential biases in my research?

datacollection.q1: What technologies or tools can improve data collection?
datacollection.q2: How can I ensure the accuracy and reliability of the collected data?
datacollection.q3: What advanced data analysis methods are applicable to my study?
datacollection.q4: How can I interpret the results effectively and objectively?
datacollection.q5: What strategies can I use to manage large data sets?

collaboration.q1: How can I establish effective collaborations with other researchers?
collaboration.q2: What platforms or forums are useful for sharing and discussing findings?
collaboration.q3: How can I leverage international networks in my field of research?
collaboration.q4: What are the best practices for working in multidisciplinary research teams?
collaboration.q5: How can I stay connected with the global scientific community?

funding.q1: What funding sources are available for my area of research?
funding.q2: How can I write a convincing and effective grant proposal?
funding.q3: What project management tools can optimize my research?
funding.q4: How can I measure and demonstrate the impact of my research?
funding.q5: What strategies are effective for managing limited budgets in research projects?

publication.q1: How can I choose the right journal to publish my research?
publication.q2: What strategies can I use to improve the visibility of my work?
publication.q3: How can I effectively deal with the peer review process?
publication.q4: What are the best practices for writing and presenting findings?
publication.q5: How can I use social media and digital platforms to disseminate my results?

ethics.q1: How can I ensure that my research is ethically responsible?
ethics.q2: What protocols should I follow for the protection of sensitive data?
ethics.q3: How to handle informed consent issues in clinical studies?
ethics.q4: What are the emerging ethical challenges in my field of study?
ethics.q5: How can I contribute to the creation of evidence-based policies?

optionsMenu.t1: Hello, I am your Artificial Intelligence assistant. You can ask me questions about health and I will be happy to help you.
optionsMenu.t4: to find out more about what I can do for you, or try one of the suggestions we propose:
optionsMenu.q1: Suggest 3 to 5 clinical trials for me
optionsMenu.q2: What are the latest scientific publications for my disease?
optionsMenu.q3: What is my current health situation?
optionsMenu.q5.1: I want to see my recent events
optionsMenu.q5.2: I want to see my current treatments
optionsMenu.q5.3: I want to see my current symptoms
optionsMenu.q5.4: I want to see my upcoming appointments
optionsMenu.q5.5: I want to see my latest lab results
optionsMenu.q5.6: I want to add a new symptom
optionsMenu.q5.7: I want to add a new medication
optionsMenu.q5.8: I want to change a medication dosage
optionsMenu.q5.9: I want to record a custom event
optionsMenu.t7: You can upload a report to provide you with more personalized information and answer your questions about the content of the document. You can do this from the icon below.
optionsMenu.q8: Give me advice on caring for this patient
optionsMenu.hint: Tip: You can record events by typing 'add' or 'record' followed by the event. For example: 'add dentist appointment tomorrow', 'record headache', 'add new blood pressure medication'

home.welcome: Thank you for signing up for Nav29!
home.subtitle: Let's start your journey to better health.
home.s0.1: Upload your first medical report now and let Nav29 start working for you.
home.s0.3: Once you've uploaded your first report, our system will analyze the information and be ready to answer your questions and help you better understand your health.
home.s0.4: Go ahead, take the first step toward smarter, more personalized medical data management!
home.s0.5: Your custom intelligence has been born and is feeding on your first report!
home.s0.6: Please wait a few seconds for it to finish. If the report is very large, it may take a few minutes.
home.s2.1: Your custom intelligence is feeding on another report!
home.docTile: These are the events that I have detected. Uncheck the wrong ones:
home.vetanal: We have analyzed your clinical analysis in Nav29!
home.vet1: We have analyzed your medical report in Nav29! Now we need your help to confirm the accuracy of the extracted data. Please:
home.vet2: Verify the identified data (appointments, medications, medical events)
home.vet3: Check events that have already occurred and are not relevant now.
home.vet4: Please report any incorrect or irrelevant information.
home.vet5: With your help, Nav29 will be able to provide you with more accurate and useful health information.
home.vet6: Provide end dates (if applicable) for diagnostics and medications. This information is crucial to your care and treatment.
home.botmsg1: Hi, I'm your AI assistant. You can ask me questions about health and I will be happy to help you. You can upload a report to provide you with more personalized information and answer your questions about the content of the document. You can do this from the icon below. During the conversation, I can detect and save new ones important events from what you tell me. You can also ask me about the saved data. I can also help you share this data with your doctor and provide you with questionnaires about your health.
home.botmsg2: Hello, how can I help you?
home.botmsg4:
Data not saved. 
 How can I help you?
home.placeholderError: We have not detected any text in the document.
home.donate_explanation: Your data can help improve and develop new medical tools and technologies. By donating your data, you contribute to medical research and the development of artificial intelligence in healthcare.
home.donate_anonymity: Your data will be completely anonymous. We have a process to anonymize uploaded documents and we do not share your data with third parties.
home.You will be returned to the initial form: You will be returned to the initial form
home.Please rate the summary before proceedin: Please rate the summary before proceeding to events

summary.Name: Name
summary.brief description: Main diagnosis, or brief description of the patient
summary.medication list: List with the medication of the patient
summary.completeform: In order for Nav29 to provide accurate answers, some information is very important, such as the diagnosis, date of birth, and sex of the patient. Please fill in the form below
summary.iEbod: The patients date of birth is
summary.iEg: The gender of the patient is
summary.iEd: The main diagnosis, or brief description of the patient is
summary.summaryrecommendation: A file has failed and needs to be deleted. We cannot ensure that the information from the failed files is incorporated into the summary. We recommend deleting and re-uploading the files or contacting us at support@foundation29.org. Do you want to continue to view the summary?
summary.NoDocsRecommendation: You have not uploaded any documents. To generate a comprehensive summary, it is recommended to upload relevant reports. Do you want to continue with the summary using only the data entered in the initial form?

messages.m0: Processing of document {{value}} has started. The following tasks are going to be performed:
messages.m5.3: {{value}} documents are being anonymised. I will let you know when they are ready.
messages.m5.4: The document is being anonymized. I'll let you know when it's ready. It may take 1 or 2 minutes.
messages.m6.3: The patient's summary is being created based on the data from the initial form and the documents. I will notify you in the notifications when it is ready. It may take 1 or 2 minutes.
messages.expect0: Our artificial intelligence is hard at work analyzing your reports and comparing them against hundreds of sources of information to offer you the most accurate and personalized answer. This can take up to 1 minute. Thank you for your patience.
messages.expect1: Our artificial intelligence is carefully examining your reports and cross-checking them against numerous sources of information to provide you with the most accurate and personalized response. This process can take up to a minute. We appreciate your patience.
messages.expect2: Currently, our artificial intelligence system is processing your reports and comparing them with hundreds of databases to provide you with the most accurate response tailored to your needs. This procedure can take up to a minute. Thank you for your patience.
messages.expect3: Please be patient as our artificial intelligence works hard analyzing your reports and cross-checking them against hundreds of information sources. This process can take up to a minute to ensure an accurate and personalized response.
messages.expect4: We are using our artificial intelligence to analyze your reports and compare them against multiple sources of information, in order to provide you with the most accurate and personalized response possible. This task can take up to a minute. We appreciate your patience during this time.
messages.expect5: Our artificial intelligence is at work, analyzing your reports and comparing them with a vast amount of information sources to give you the best possible answer. This procedure can take up to a minute. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
messages.errindex: An error occurred while processing the document. Please try again.
messages.The summary has failed, click to generat: The summary has failed, click to generate it again
messages.doctype1: Detected to be a medical report
messages.doctype3: It has been detected that it is not a medical report or analysis
messages.errRes: An error occurred while generating the summary. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.tryres: Do you want to try again to generate the digest?
messages.errDetEve: An error occurred while detecting events. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.tryDetEve: Do you want to try to detect events again?
messages.msgError: It is not available yet. Please try again in a few minutes. If the error persists after 10 minutes, delete the report and re-upload it.
messages.errProcFile: An error occurred while processing the file. Please, try again.
messages.procesando intent: Analysing your request to understand what you need...
messages.intent detectado: We have understood your request, we are now looking for the appropriate information...
messages.generando respuesta: We are generating a response based on the relevant information found...
messages.respuesta generada: We have prepared a response to your request. Here it is...
messages.generando sugerencias: We are creating additional suggestions that might be useful for you...
messages.Patient Context: Verifying relevant information in your medical records...
messages.Raw Patient Documents: Reviewing other documents you have provided to find useful information...
messages.Dravet Syndrome Book: Searching our Dravet syndrome database to find relevant information...
messages.PubMed: Searching PubMed.org for scientific articles related to your query...
messages.Arxiv: Checking Arxiv.org to find research papers that may help answer your query...

about.footer1: We are a non-profit organisation that designs and creates tools for patients to manage their own data, revolutionising the
about.footer2: diagnosis and management of rare diseases. We empower patients and doctors to use their medical data or their benefit and that
about.footer3: of the community. We believe there is a better way to do things centred on the patient and their data.
about.footer6: For any questions or queries, please contact us at

wizard.p1.2: We want you to understand how we protect your data.

expectations.p1: Thank you for joining us at this early stage! You're accessing a beta version of Nav29, which means we're still in the process of polishing some rough edges and adding new functionality. As you explore and use our tools, it's You may encounter some bugs or unexpected behavior.
expectations.p3: Innovation in Progress: You'll get a first-hand look at the latest features we're developing.
expectations.p4: Bugs and limitations: As this is a beta version, the system may have bugs that we are actively working to resolve.
expectations.p5: Regular updates: We will implement improvements and fixes periodically, based on your feedback and our development schedule.
expectations.p7: Share your impressions: Your comments are vital. If something doesn't work as you expected, or if you have ideas on how we can improve, we would love to know. You can do so using the red button on the right side .
expectations.p8: Patience and understanding: We appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to provide you with the best experience possible.
expectations.p9: Report problems: If you find errors or problems, please report them. This will help us identify and fix problems more quickly.
expectations.p11: We are committed to continually improving and taking your suggestions into account so that together we can create the best version of our system.
expectations.p12: Thank you for being part of this journey! Your participation is invaluable and we are excited to see how our tool evolves with your help.

steps.privacyNickname: If privacy is a concern, feel free to use just a nickname.
steps.primaryGoalDescription: Help us personalise your Nav29 experience. Select the option that best describes you.
steps.ageImportance: Age is a key factor in health assessment.
steps.measurementSystem: Select your preferred measurement system to accurately record your height and weight.
steps.ethnicGroupDescription: Different racial and ethnic groups have varied health tendencies. We use this information to provide more accurate health recommendations.
steps.genderImpact: Biological sex can impact risk for certain conditions and response to treatments.
steps.chronicConditions: Do you have any chronic conditions or past health issues?
steps.chronicConditionsDescription: Include any chronic conditions or medical issues experienced. Essential for understanding health history and personalized care.
steps.familyHealthHistory: Do you have a family health history?
steps.familyHealthHistoryDescription: The family's health history can indicate genetic risks. Knowing this helps us predict and prevent potential health issues.
steps.knownAllergies: Do you have any known allergies?
steps.surgicalHistory: Do you have any surgical history?
steps.currentMedications: Are you currently taking any medications?
steps.alcoholIntakeDescription: A standard drink is equivalent to a regular can or bottle of beer, a typical serving (glass) of wine, or a shot of distilled spirits.
steps.placeholderchronicConditions: e.g., diabetes, high blood pressure, heart attack 2 years ago
steps.placeholderfamilyHealthHistory: e.g., mother with diabetes, father had heart disease, sibling with asthma
steps.placeholderknownAllergies: e.g., peanut allergy, Penicillin allergy, tree and grass pollen
steps.placeholdersurgicalHistory: e.g., cardiac stenting in 2019, appendectomy in 2003

consenttext.p2.1: At Nav29, protecting your personal data is our priority. This privacy policy explains in simple terms how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information, in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
consenttext.p2.2: Your data is important to us. We use it to evaluate how our artificial intelligence (AI) models perform, but never to train them. This means we use your data to check if the AI is working correctly, but not to teach it new things. Additionally, we never share your data with third parties, including AI model providers.
consenttext.p3.1: Information you provide us: Name, email address, health data, information in medical reports, and any other information you upload or provide through Nav29.
consenttext.p3.2: Information we collect automatically: IP address, information about your device, and data on how you use Nav29. This information helps us improve the app.
consenttext.p5: We use the information you provide to us to:
consenttext.p5.1: Ensure Nav29 functions correctly and provide you with our services.
consenttext.p5.2: Improve Nav29 and your user experience.
consenttext.p5.3: Communicate with you about updates or important information.
consenttext.p5.4: Detect, prevent, and resolve technical or security issues.
consenttext.p5.5: We also use your data to evaluate the effectiveness of our artificial intelligence models, but never to train them. These models are:
consenttext.p5.6: The data we collect automatically is used anonymously to improve Nav29 and is never associated with you.
consenttext.p6.1: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except:
consenttext.p6.1.1: With your explicit consent: You can use the 'Share' feature to share your information with your doctor or another healthcare professional.
consenttext.p6.1.2: If required by law: We may share data with competent authorities if necessary.
consenttext.p7.1: LangSmith: We use LangSmith, a platform on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) servers in Europe, to develop and improve Nav29, complying with GDPR. We only collect and use personal data for these services and protect them with security measures.
consenttext.p7.2: Firebase: We use Firebase, a Google service, for secure user authentication, complying with GDPR. We only collect the necessary information to verify your identity and protect it with security measures. Authentication data is stored on Google servers within the European Union.
consenttext.p8.2: Right of access: You can request information about the personal data we hold about you.
consenttext.p8.3: Right of rectification: You can ask us to correct any errors in your personal data.
consenttext.p8.4: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'): You can request that we delete your personal data.
consenttext.p8.5: Right to restrict processing: You can request that we limit the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances.
consenttext.p8.6: Right to data portability: You can request that we send your personal data to you in a common electronic format.
consenttext.p8.7: Right to object: You can object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances.
consenttext.p8.8: Right not to be subject to automated individual decision-making (including profiling): You have the right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, including profiling, that produces legal effects on you or significantly affects you in a similar way.
consenttext.p8.9: To exercise these rights, send an email to support@foundation29.org.
consenttext.p9.1: We implement security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
consenttext.p10.1: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy, unless the law requires or permits a longer retention period.
consenttext.p11.1: Your data is stored and processed within the European Union and will not be transferred to countries outside the EU.
consenttext.p12.1: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will post any changes on our website and notify you by email.
consenttext.p13.1: The Data Controller of the personal data provided through the application is Fundaci√≥n 29 de Febrero (F29), located at calle Santa Fe, n√∫mero 1, 2¬∫E ‚Äì Pozuelo de Alarc√≥n (Madrid) with CIF G-87894119.
consenttext.p13.2: You can also contact the entity through this email account: support@foundation29.org
consenttext.p14: Contact details of the Data Protection Officer.
consenttext.p14.1: We inform the user that they can contact our Data Protection Officer for any queries or to exercise their rights at the following address: privacy@foundation29.org
consenttext.p15: Exercising the rights of the data subjects.
consenttext.p15.1: We inform you that at any time you can exercise your rights as legally provided by sending a written communication to the address: Calle Santa Fe, n√∫mero 1, 2¬∫E ‚Äì Pozuelo de Alarc√≥n (Madrid), or to the email: privacy@foundation29.org
consenttext.p15.2: Please note that in this communication you must indicate the right you wish to exercise (request access to your personal data, its rectification, deletion, portability, and the limitation of its processing, as well as objecting to it), the data or set of personal data subject to your claim, and provide a valid identity document.
consenttext.p15.3: Finally, we inform you that you have the right to file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency, as the supervisory authority. www.aepd.es.
consenttext.p16.1: If you have any questions, contact us at support@foundation29.org

home.keywords: Nav29, medical data management, secure storage, intelligent medical summaries, personal health assistant, data privacy, rare diseases, diagnosis, scientific advancements, digital health
home.description: Nav29 empowers you to manage your medical data with security and privacy. Enjoy secure storage, intelligent medical summaries, and a personal health assistant, all for free.
home.title: Nav29: Take Control of Your Medical Data - Free Personalized Assistance

open.perm1title: See patient's age, name and gender
open.The accesses to your data will be shown: The accesses to your data will be shown here
open.InfoPermissions: Select what information researchers will be able to see. You can also add an informative note.
open.nosharing: You have not created any sharing links
open.infoshare1: This app allows you to share your medical data with anyone you want, in a secure and controlled way. By generating an invitation link or a QR code, you are allowing the person who receives it to access your medical information.
open.infoshare2: The key to this process is that you are in complete control. At any time you can delete the invitation and, in doing so, the person you shared it with will no longer have access to your data.
open.infoshare3: To maintain more detailed control, we recommend that you generate different invitations for different people. That way, if at some point you decide that a particular person should no longer have access, you can simply delete their invitation rather than having to remove access for everyone.
open.infoshare4: We have included a notes field for each invitation you generate. Here you can add any details that will help you identify who you are giving access to. It could be the person's name, their relationship to you, the reason you are sharing your data with them, or any other information you find useful.
open.infoshare5: Remember, the management of your medical data is personal and should be controlled by you. This functionality is designed to help you do just that.
open.Notecustom: Invitation created automatically when generating the PDF.
open.infoDownloadPDF: By downloading this PDF, you have generated a link and a unique QR code that allows anyone with access to the document to view your medical information. This link and QR can be managed from the 'Share' section of the application. Remember, you have full control over who can access your data. You can remove the link at any time to prevent access to your information. We recommend that you keep track of who you share this document with to protect your privacy.
open.instructionMA: If you do not have Microsoft Authenticator, you can download it here
open.To access patient data, please continue: To access patient data, please continue with one of the following options
open.VPN active description: Disable your VPN and access the invitation link again or reload the page

tutorial.docsContent:
This is your section for medical documents and events where you can:
  • üìÑ Upload new documents
  • üìã View summaries of each document
  • üìÖ Explore extracted medical events
  • ‚è±Ô∏è View the complete patient timeline
  • üìä Access all registered medical events
tutorial.chatContent:
Here you can interact with your AI assistant:
  • üí¨ Ask questions about your health and documents
  • üí° View suggested frequently asked questions
  • üìã Get summaries of your documents
  • üîç Explore different categories of questions
  • üíä Consult about medications and treatments
  • üìù Save important conversation notes
tutorial.notesContent:
In this section you can:
  • üìù Create and save important notes
  • üìã Generate a complete patient summary
  • ‚úèÔ∏è Edit your existing notes
  • üì• Download the summary in PDF
  • üìå Save relevant information from the chat
tutorial.diaryContent: You and your care team can share important notes and daily observations about your health and activities.
